block.title: Jobs You May Be Interested In

phrases.phrase: Remember to clear cache to see the updates.
Are you sure? This will delete all items that belong to this category and cannot be undone.
Jobs You May Be Interested In

<title>How many sub-industry to show at first</title><info>This setting tells how many sub-industry are to be shown at first. If the list of sub-industry is longer than this value the extra ones will be hidden and a "View More" option will be shown instead, allowing the user to display the hidden sub-industry.
a "View Less" option will be available to provide the full "accordion" effect.
If you set it to zero ("0" without quotes) it will hide every sub-industry and a plus sign will show next to the industry name, clicking the plus sign will show that industry's sub-industry.</info>
<title>Number of items on Block "Top Companies", "Most Followed Companies"</title><info>Number of items on Block "Top Companies", "Most Followed Companies"</info>

<title>Number of items on block "Recent Job Posting", "Job You May Be Interested In", "Hot Job Posting"</title><info>Number of items on block "Recent Job Posting", "Job You May Be Interested In", "Hot Job Posting"</info>
